MESSAGE

FROM OUR CEO

[vc_column_text]

Since inception of RFCO, we are dedicated to building environment that is pillared on innovation & efficiency; one where our customer, employees, partners, and our stack-holders are met with the integrity and respect they aim. RFCO believes in creating LIVABLE COMMUNITIES that include all lifestyle services and needed facilities for hassle-free life. A Community that operates as one harmonious entity that serve our customer needs during and after delivery. Since we started our journey, our success has been a source of pride and an inspiration for us to embrace the present and continue building for the future. We have continuously strived to create livable communities and projects. After more than 18 successful projects in Egypt, we witnessed the vibrant birth of our new project in the new Cairo Capital, IL MONDO Compound.

RFCO

About US

[vc_column_text]

RFCO is a leading Egyptian real estate corporate that develops distinctive, and valuable projects in different areas of Egypt since 2015. RFCO provides more than just properties, we aim to establish a strong and active residential community. As a subsidiary of RFCO, RAMY FARES Construction is the constructing arm for customer centric projects with a new low-cost business model. RFCO developed more than 18 projects in new Cairo and the new IL Mondo development in the new Cairo Capital.
